1848	1	0001	2	This is a digital copy of a book that was preserved for generations on library shelves before it was carefully scanned by Google as part of a project
1848	1	0001	3	10 make the world’s books discoverable online.
1848	1	0001	4	It has survived long enough for the copyright to expire and the book to enter the public domain. A public domain book is one that was never subject
1848	1	0001	5	10 copyright or whose legal copyright term has expired. Whether a book is in the public domain may vary country to country. Public domain books
1848	1	0001	6	are our gateways to the past, representing a wealth of history, culture and knowledge that’s often difficult to discover.
1848	1	0001	7	Marks, notations and other marginalia present in the original volume will appear in this file - a reminder of this book’s long journey from the
1848	1	0001	8	publisher to a library and finally to you.
1848	1	0001	9	Usage guidelines
1848	1	0001	10	Google is proud to partner with libraries to digitize public domain materials and make them widely accessible. Public domain books belong to the
1848	1	0001	11	public and we are merely their custodians. Nevertheless, this work is expensive, so in order to keep providing this resource, we have taken steps to
1848	1	0001	12	prevent abuse by commercial parties, including placing technical restrictions on automated querying.
1848	1	0001	13	We also ask that you:
1848	1	0001	14	+ Make non-commercial use of the files We designed Google Book Search for use by individual
1848	1	0001	15	personal, non-commercial purposes.
1848	1	0001	16	and we request that you use these files for
1848	1	0001	17	+ Refrain from automated querying Do not send automated queries of any sort to Google’s system: If you are conducting research on machine
1848	1	0001	18	translation, optical character recognition or other areas where access to a large amount of text is helpful, please contact us. We encourage the
1848	1	0001	19	use of public domain materials for these purposes and may be able to help.
1848	1	0001	20	+ Maintain attribution The Google “watermark” you see on each file is essential for informing people about this project and helping them find
1848	1	0001	21	additional materials through Google Book Search. Please do not remove it.
1848	1	0001	22	+ Keep it legal Whatever your use, remember that you are responsible for ensuring that what you are doing is legal. Do not assume that just
1848	1	0001	23	because we believe a book is in the public domain for users in the United States, that the work is also in the public domain for users in other
1848	1	0001	24	countries. Whether a book is still in copyright varies from country to country, and we can’t offer guidance on whether any specific use of
1848	1	0001	25	any specific book is allowed. Please do not assume that a book’s appearance in Google Book Search means it can be used in any manner
1848	1	0001	26	anywbhere in the world. Copyright infringement liability can be quite severe.

1848	1	0187	14	und ganz in der Ordnung. Was das Maass der

1848	1	0187	16	oder Bedürftigste insofern befriedigt werden, als
